description:
This is a feature fantasy role play starring the sexy Joanna Jet and introducing Bianca Stone.

Bianca is a spoiled little rich college student living in an apartment where her dad pays the rent. She never really sees her international business man father who is often far away for many months at a time. When he announces to Bianca that he has remarried and that his new wife - her new English stepmother - will be paying her a visit in the US, Bianca is pissed. How could her dad send a strange woman to see her? Bianca plays to be as bitchy as possible to her new mommy until the woman leaves.

When Joanna falls asleep on the couch, exhausted with jet lag, Bianca decides to have a little fun. She ties Joanna up and pounces on her. Joanna has a punishment in mind for this bad behavoiur, but it won’t be a grounding, it will be a fucking with her very stern and very hard cock.
title: Step Mommy has a COCK: Bratty New Daughter Finds out the Hard Way
